name: Ch11BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Franz;So tomorrow's the big day, huh?|We finally set sail for Grado.
speak;Ross;Yeah! I can't wait!|My first real journey across the sea!
speak;Franz;Are you nervous at all?|The waters can get pretty rough this time of year.
speak;Ross;Well...maybe a little.|I've heard stories about seasickness.|My dad said it's worse than any battle wound!
speak;Franz;I've heard the same.|Apparently even the toughest warriors can be laid low by the rocking of the waves.
speak;Ross;Great...|Now I'm definitely worried.|What if I spend the whole trip hanging over the railing?
speak;Lute;Did I hear someone expressing concern about seasickness?|How fortuitous that I should be passing by at this exact moment.
speak;Franz;Oh, hello Lute.|Were you eavesdropping on us?
speak;Lute;I prefer the term "collecting conversational data."|But that's irrelevant now.|I have a solution to your maritime malady concerns!
speak;Lute;I've concocted a preventative elixir specifically designed to combat seasickness!|It's quite effective, based on my research.
speak;Lute;Of course.|I am a prodigy after all.|Here, I've brought samples for both of you.
speak;Ross;Wait a second...|What exactly is in this... stuff?|It smells weird.
speak;Lute;Oh, just some herbs, minerals, and...|Well, I suppose full disclosure is important in medical contexts...
speak;Lute;It contains precisely measured portions of powdered revenant bone,|gorgon scales,|some mogall eye fluid,|and a dash of bael venom for potency.
speak;Lute;The ingredients may sound unconventional,|but I assure you I've calculated the proportions with absolute precision.
speak;Lute;Of course!|I tested it on myself first.|I only experienced minor hallucinations and temporary numbness in my extremities.
speak;Ross;Um...|I think I'd rather take my chances with the seasickness!
speak;Lute;But the efficacy rate is nearly 82%!|That's remarkably high for an experimental compound!
speak;Franz;Thanks, but no thanks, Lute!|We should really get going now!|Right, Ross?
speak;Ross;Right!|Very right!|Gotta prepare for tomorrow!|Bye Lute!
speak;Lute;Wait!|You're making an irrational decision based on emotional response rather than scientific merit!|The monster parts are perfectly safe once processed correctly!
speak;Lute;Come back!|At least take it with you in case you change your minds!|I spent three days extracting that mogall fluid!
